Panama City really is the most modern capital in all of Central America.
The best way to see Panama City is by foot.
...you certainly get to see what a vibrant metropolis the capital is.
People come to Panama City to see the canal,...
...but there's so much more to be found here.
The gorgeous architecture of the old town...
...is in stark contrast with the Miami-esque skyline,...
...the perfect combination of old world charm and new world style.
